section.title: &desig; Initial Configuration
section.para: After the &productname; installation has been completed, &desig; requires initial configuration to operate.

section.title: Identifying Name Server Public IPs
section.para: Depending on the back-end, the method used to identify the name servers' public IPs will differ.

section.title: InfoBlox
section.para: InfoBlox will act as your public name servers, consult the InfoBlox management UI to identify the IPs.

section.title: Creating Name Server A Records
section.para: Each name server requires a public name, for example ns1.example.com., to which &desig;-managed domains will be delegated. There are two common locations where these may be registered, either within a zone hosted on &desig; itself, or within a zone hosted on a external DNS service.

para.emphasis: If you are using an externally managed zone for these names:

step.para: For each name server public IP, create the necessary A records in the external system.

para.emphasis: If you are using a &desig;-managed zone for these names:
